title: On Stage: High School Band Festival In Luverne, MN
teaser: Nearly two dozen high school marching bands will converge for the 64th annual TriState Band Festival in Luverne, Minn.
contentencoded:
On Friday we go “On Stage,” our look at what’s happening on the boards across the country.

This week, we go to Luverne, Minnesota, where nearly two dozen high school marching bands will converge for the 64th annual TriState Band Festival.

Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks to Jane Wildung Lanphere, who helps to organize the event.

  • See other “On Stage” segments

Guest

  • Jane Wildung Lanphere, event organizer and executive director of the Luverne Area Chamber of Commerce.
